General.Name: Tantalex Resources Corporation
General.Description: Tantalex Lithium Resources Corp. engages in the acquisition, exploration, development, and distribution of lithium, tantalum, cobalt, tin, and other mineral properties in Africa. It holds interest in the Manono Lithium Tailings Project and the Pegmatite Corridor Exploration Project located at Manono, the Democratic Republic of Congo; and. The company was formerly known as Tantalex Resources Corporation and changed its name to Tantalex Lithium Resources Corp. in May 2022. Tantalex Lithium Resources Corp. was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Toronto, Canada.
General.Address: 120 Adelaide St. W, Toronto, ON, Canada, M5H 1T1
